endpoints.description: Submit routing data and constraints to generate an optimized transportation path for efficient delivery.
Retrieve the current status of all active shipments in the network.
Access predictive delivery reports based on historical shipment data and patterns.
Modify specific details of an ongoing shipment, such as delivery time or route.
Configure alert settings for delays or deviations in tracked shipments.
Retrieve current traffic conditions relevant to planned shipment routes.
Fetch detailed information about a specific logistics location based on its identifier.
Allow users to report transportation issues to improve service quality.
Permit the deletion of specific shipment records from the system if needed.
Provide insights into the transportation network's efficiency and performance metrics.
